extendedInfo.description: ***Please report to luigi.papino@gmail.com any problem ******Please, add smartphone model and rom in problem report***Are you a Magician, a Druid or a Summoner (or similar) in PFRPG? STOP with handbook consultation while using "summon Monster" or "summon Nature's Ally" spells! This application will allow you to use those spells WITHOUT handbooks. ALL you need is here, and it do not needs internet connection!This Application will help you managing summoned monsters. ALL summonable monster (Based on OGL terms) are selectable in this application.You will have a complete sheet for those monster, and you will be able to interact with her! Don't forget to vote and leave a review! I live with your review, Thanks!PFRPG stands for PF Role Playing Game, the fantasy RPG by Paizo Publishing.Features:* Augment Summoning* Celestial and Fiendish* Manage up to 5 creatures at time* Ac, touch, flat-footed* Spell Resistance, Damage resistance* Fortitude, Reflex, Will* Combat maneuver bonus (CMB), combat maneuver defense (CMD)* Hit dice, Bonus Attack Base, Hit points* Alignment, subtype* Ability Scores* Attacks and roll attack and damage, Special Attack* Spells, Skills, Feats, Special Qualities, Defensive Abilities, Senses, SpeedChangelog 1.6.08â¢ BugfixesChangelog 1.6.5****************************************Please, if you still have problems, contact me at luigi.papino@gmail.com.I can't reproduce this issue.*****************************************â¢ Database Bugfix.Changelog 1.6.4* Cleanup of code* Added optionally "Collect usage statistic"* minor bugfixChangelog 1.6.2â¢ Added support for report database errorâ¢ Minor bugfixChangelog 1.6.1â¢ Various Bugfixâ¢ Maybe, Database exception resolved :)Changelog 1.6.0â¢ New Theme, more readableâ¢ Now manage Critical Hitâ¢ Added Round counterâ¢ Added An option to set the number of summoned monstersâ¢  Added the details on Smite Evil/Good (attack bonus and damage bonus) under other details on the attackâ¢ Various BugfixChangelog 1.5.3*Various bugfix and adjustment.Changelog 1.5.2*Added BAB* HP BugfixChangelog 1.5.0* New Interface more comfortable for Tablet/Honeycomb* New Interface for smartphone* Added HD * Move to SD Card* Various BugFix* Code Clean upChangelog 1.2.0* Now report HD and Cha bonus in Smite Evil/Good* Size installation ReducedChangelog 1.1.1*Critical bugfix (proguard)Changelog 1.1.0* Fixed Stirge* Add LVL to Reduce App size* Improved Support for HoneyCombChangelog 1.0.6* Fixed fortitude, now change in according to Augment Summoning* Fixed More Activity* Fixed Bulette crash;ChangeLog 1.0.5* Fixed Electric Eel and Mite crash;* Fixed template issue* Now DC constitution-based, like poison, change in according to Augment summoning* Now cmd bonus and cmb bonus changes in according to Augment Summoning* Now bonus damage like "1d6 cold bonus" in ice devil is considered in Roll Attack.* Improved UI*Tags: d20,rpg,wizard,bard,cleric,sorcer,druid,ranger,spell,summon,monster,nature's ally,pfrpg,augment summoning, celestial, fiendish,prd,pfsrd,path finder, dungeons, dragons, dnd

reviews.title: not too shabby
reviews.comment: I\'m quite impressed with this app :-)  a few minor things, sometimes some of the buttons don\'t want to accept commands. For example, trying to change the HP of Monsters is slow and unresponsive . also you should support multiple different kinds of monsters in 1 section from multiple levels.(like a riding dog @ lv1 and an octopus from lv 2) Also a few newer feat options are available for druid ( moonlight and sunlight summons) making those options available would be sweet as well. overall great and helpful
reviews.author: William Dickey

reviews.title: Great and useful, but could use a font change
reviews.comment: Great app, that also links to the different abilities of the creatures you summon.  Unfortunately, the font used for the ability descriptions can be hard to read
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy, but a little out of date
reviews.comment: This is a really useful tool for anybody who does a lot of summoning; it\'ll give you the stats for whichever monster you summon, descriptions of all of their abilities, and it will modify all of the appropriate modifiers if you have Augment Summoning.  On the down side, there\'s no way for it to track multiple different summon spells at once, and it still doesn\'t have the new elementals & templates that were introduced in the Bestiary II.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I\'m using this to replace my old PDF of summoned creatures. It\'s a lot faster and easier to use, thanks a bunch!
reviews.author: Eric Pile

reviews.title: Good reference
reviews.comment: Love it...we share reference books and this is nice when I want to plan Ahead...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A fine app
reviews.comment: Easy to run and is a great help with all summons. This app was definitely worth paying for. Highly recommend it to anyone who plays Pathfinder
reviews.author: Travis H

reviews.title: Great for summoners
reviews.comment: Really useful app if you cast summon monster. Great interface and program updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: Installed on my Transformer and have had no issues what so ever. It can only keep track of one summon spell at a time though. That being said, it\'s still a very tight app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love It!!!
reviews.comment: I am learning/trying to play a summoner and this application is perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I needed.
reviews.comment: Perfect for looking up stuff while waiting for something or quick reference at the table.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app offers just about everything to make playing a summoner viable. The only thing that could have been added to improve it is augmented summons
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Not sure how to apply augment summoning feat. That could be clearer. The elementals from Beastiary 2 could be added; ice, mud, lava, and lightning elementals of all sizes. Also a feature for Eidelons and familiars would be nice, since they are as hard to keep track of as other summoned monsters. Though, the eidelon might warrant its own app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this app so far looks like it will come in handy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: clean and simple
reviews.comment: Looks like it will be a useful addition to my toolkit. However, one thing that I think it could use is the ability to manage more than one summon spell concurrently. For instance: If you cast a summon monster that pulls 3 critters, then the next round summon another with a separate spell, dropping back to the list of Summon spells with the \"back\" button clears out any of your active summons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app for summoning
reviews.comment: Well done!!! Summoning can be so laborious on the fly.   This makes it a breeze, esp with multiple lower level creatures.  Major kudos!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great work!
reviews.comment: This app is useful as hell! I love it!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pathfinder /Paizo version of the rules compliant
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is *awesome* useful! Although it doesn\'t have psionic critters. Even still, any caster with Summon Monster spells should definitely get this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the most intuitive and easy-to-use apps. Make more Pathfinder apps, and I\'ll buy them all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very helpful use every time I play
reviews.author: Vinson Needler
